justification: "The self-assessment manikin (SAM) is a non-verbal assessment of affective states… It consists of three pictorial items: Valence… arousal… and dominance… that are each measured on a 9-point scale."

measured_by: High-frequency heart-rate variability (HFHRV) and RMSSD obtained with Alive photoplethysmography
justification: "Cardiac activity was recorded… using the Alive Software … The high frequency component of HRV (HFHRV… ) and … RMSSD… were extracted… Both indices are commonly used as indicators of vagal tone."
"A judgment of performance (JOP) questionnaire was used to assess the participants’ prospective estimations of how well they would perform… The questionnaire consisted of six items…"
construct: prospective performance confidence / judgement of performance

justification: "The team workload questionnaire (TWLQ… ) was administered… and used to assess how participants experienced workload demands on team tasks during the exercise."
construct: team workload demands / communication demand / coordination demand

measured_by: Cyber Situational Awareness Questionnaire for Analysts (CSAQA)
justification: "To assess CSA among participants, the CSA Questionnaire for Analysts (CSAQA… ) was administered at the end of each day."

measured_by: Deviation score between Judgment of Performance and CSA scores
justification: "MCA scores were calculated as a deviation score using the approach described in Meessen et al. (2018)… a low MCA score indicates high metacognitive accuracy."
